[[Image:Carl Phelpstead.png|thumb]]
'''Carl Phelpstead''' is a Professor of English Literature at [[Wikipedia:Cardiff University|Cardiff University]] in [[Wikipedia:Wales|Wales]]. His research and teaching focus on Old Norse-Icelandic literature, Old and Middle English literature, and modern medievalism.<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.carlphelpstead.info/biography|articlename=Biography|dated=|website=[http://www.carlphelpstead.info/ CarlPhelpstead.info]|accessed=7 February 2012}}</ref>
